results.name: Guild Wars 2
results.description: This game requires an SSD hard drive as 3D models are lazy loaded constantly.
results.notes: To improve performance, these settings are suggested.
results.content:
files:
- gw2installer: https://account.arena.net/content/download/gw2/win/64
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Guild Wars 2/GW2-64.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Running Guild Wars 2 Installer.
    executable: gw2installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: lutris-GE-Proton7-1-x86_64
